ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
A functional docstring linter which checks whether a docstring's description
matches the actual function/method implementation. Darglint expects
docstrings to be formatted using the Google Python Style Guide.
about.summary: A python documentation linter which checks that the docstring description matches the definition.

about.description:
A functional docstring linter which checks whether a docstring's description
matches the actual function/method implementation. Darglint expects
docstrings to be formatted using the Google Python Style Guide.
about.summary: A python documentation linter which checks that the docstring description matches the definition.

name: darglint
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "darglint" %}
{% set version = "1.8.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 080d5106df149b199822e7ee7deb9c012b49891538f14a11be681044f0bb20da

build:
  number: 1
  entry_points:
    - darglint = darglint.driver:main
  script: '{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv '
  noarch: python

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
    - poetry
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - darglint
    - darglint.docstring
    - darglint.parse
  commands:
    - darglint --help

about:
  home: http://github.com/terrencepreilly/darglint
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: A python documentation linter which checks that the docstring description matches the definition.
  description: |
    A functional docstring linter which checks whether a docstring's description
    matches the actual function/method implementation. Darglint expects
    docstrings to be formatted using the Google Python Style Guide.
  dev_url: http://github.com/terrencepreilly/darglint

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - asford
    - jcollado
